analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol#470-483) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol#478-479)

ModulumTokenICO.finalization (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol)

ModulumTokenICO.ModulumTokenICO (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol#784-808) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(address(tokenHolder),8775000000000000027262976) (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol#803-804)
	-token.mint(_wallet,3509999999999999903531008) (/unique_contracts/0x2e68bb08a8594eef7de8b7700c6d3df7a287c136.sol#807-808)
